title: Annual Acquisition and Disposals of Capital Assets

questions.text: Are you able to report for the calendar year during this time?
What dates will you be reporting for? From
What dates will you be reporting for? To

question_groups.title: B. Major improvements and construction work

questions.text: For the period, can the business' provide information regarding capital expenditure on major improvements and construction work?
For the period, what was the business' value of capital expenditure on building and construction?
Of the capital expenditure on building and construction, what was the value of capital expenditure on fixtures, fittings and installations that are part of the structure?

For the reporting period, what was your business's value of capital expenditure on land improvements?
